short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: Supplier Opportunity Notice for the procurement of electrical control equipment, including starters and motors. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. ",
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence invites proposals from qualified suppliers for a Request for Proposal (RFP) titled "NSN: 6110-00-500-0360, Starter, Motor".

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: Defence (GD)
* Solicitation Number: W8482-230881/A
* Publication Date: November 7, 2022
* Closing Date: December 20, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Solicitation Status: Expired
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia and British Columbia

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of National Defence requires the following items:

* Starter, Motor (NSN: 6110-00-500-0360)
	+ Delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
	+ Quantity: 9
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
* Starter, Motor (NSN: 6110-00-500-0360)
	+ Delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
	+ Quantity: 9
	+ Unit of Issue: Each

### Submission Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

### Trade Agreements

* This RFP is subject to the trade agreements listed below:
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Stephane Potvin
Contracting Officer
Phone: 819-939-3627
Email: stephane.potvin2
